title: Israeli leadership breaking with US for first time - Chomsky | Al Jazeera Newsfeed
description:
Israel’s government is openly breaking with the US for the first time, Noam Chomsky told Al Jazeera, adding that far-right officials like Minister of National Security Itamar Ben-Gvir and Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich “are simply telling the United States, get lost.”
